title: The Amazing Bone (K)
creator_credit: Michael Sporn, Michael Sporn Animation and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Pearl the pig finds a magic talking bone. On the way home the bone scares off a band of muggers, but does not fair as well with a debonair fox. Although Pearl and the talking bone so live happily ever after.
